Actions.Name: Pseudopod
Actions.Description: A character in range is shoved 1 in a direction of the [name]'s choice.

Actions.Name: Slide
Actions.Description: The [name] rushes 3 spaces. Foes it passes through take 1 damage.
Actions.Effects: If this ability is used again this turn, it deals +2 more damage. This effect does not stack.
